retrieved_kb_items.title: Expected card delivery timeframe
retrieved_kb_items.content: New cards are typically delivered within 7-10 business days after approval. Replacement cards usually arrive within 5-7 business days. Express delivery (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee. You'll receive tracking information via email or SMS once your card ships. If your card hasn't arrived after 10 business days, please contact us.

retrieved_kb_items.title: How to track your card delivery
retrieved_kb_items.content: To track your card delivery: 1) Check the email confirmation sent when your card was shipped (contains tracking number), 2) Log into your account and visit the Card Management section, 3) Use our mobile app's card tracking feature, or 4) Ask our AI assistant for delivery status. You'll receive SMS updates if you've opted in for notifications.

retrieved_kb_items.title: What to do if your card hasn't arrived
retrieved_kb_items.content: If your card hasn't arrived within the expected timeframe (7-10 business days for new cards, 5-7 for replacements), please: 1) Verify your mailing address in your account settings, 2) Check with your local post office, 3) Contact us to report a missing card - we'll cancel the original and issue a replacement, 4) Consider requesting express delivery for the replacement. We can also arrange for card pickup at a branch if available in your area.
